What about Galio? You know, the gargoyle?
Never heard of him. Is he from DotA?
No, DotA would of named him something like "Gargoyle statue thing of the death". True Story.

He's hard to play against because nobody plays him and knows how anti-mage he can be. I went against a Galio once, he completely owned me.

Of course, that might be because I'm shit, but that's besides the point.

marvelous < outrageous

For a second I thought {{champion:57}}  was a new champ, lol.
Dear riot, please give us a support named Bob... then i can always say "Dammit Bob" to my support
We have a Bob, he is from accounting... But some people know him as Definitely Not Blitzcrank.
I would've preffered Toby. So I can turn into Michael Scott in game.
{{champion:38}} {{champion:25}} Why do they still have no legs give them legs just give them a {{champion:30}} update so we will want to play them if they look awesome and they are badass
but morg is in a dress. and needs to stay that way
At the same time, her wings look like poor-quality pizza and her classic doesn't match her splash at all

I'm rather saddened by the fact that Riot posts about their plans to update champions and the new ways they're looking at the updates themselves, and 99.99% of the comments are complaining about: A. A champion that wasn't specifically mentioned. B. A champion the poster likes and is afraid of being nerfed. C. Rude complaints about previous updates. At least they're willing to update in large quantity and high quality. Most games barely update ever. Please, be happy they're doing it.

You forgot D. Bring back URF.  
I'm pretty sure that's floating around in these comments somewhere.
{{champion:83}}  is still waiting
Yorick is fine.

He's so bad they took him off free week rotation.
That's not what I'd call *fine*.
i know {{champion:83}} needs love so bad and a new skin
{{champion:6}} Give this man some damn legs
{{champion:6}} "you can't beat me, so join me. I could use a good pair of legs"

Best jungle ganks ever.
{{champion:59}} "I would've bet all of demacia that that was just a piece of wall..."
What about Pizza feet {{champion:82}} ?
{{champion:31}} I am sure he is in your sights, I just hope that you make him the best. I mean IT is the Terror of the Void.

Anyone working on Hecarim, I love how he looks and the Idea of the insanely mobile guy but He feels so under rewarding. I think his passive Is Incredibly Lame and the crowd control on his ultimate is embarasing as well. It is pretty much just a gap closer or another way for this guy who is already super fast to get away. so yeah Please update Hecarim. 
P.S. Love the Sion Rework

Thx Rito

if u update cho'gath at some point please do not update his skill set... I really like how cho works and everything he does but he needs a VU bad maybe some new skill effects but not changes to his actually skills. My point with cho is hes supposed to be some menacing monster from the void who strikes fear into his enemys. Right now he doesnt look all that menacing and I cant even tell what hes supposed to be tbh. He just seems like some ant eater monster or something he just looks terrible and outdated. He should look more evil and more VOID like. And his abilitys should display that hes from the void like his Q could open a ripple in the void and have monsters from the void deal the dmg instead of spikes or something of the sort. Just please do something with him next year hes my fav champion.

Also VU / Rework nautilis PLEASE ..... lol

I know {{champion:83}} is newer than some champions, but I highly suggest giving him a large-scale visual update with his upcoming rework.  His voice is grating and his animations are wonkey, not to mention his play-dough-esque model.  His concept is cool, but his art was just poorly executed for his time.  Are there any current plans on what level of VU Yorick might get with his new kit?

{{champion:85}} can has buff plz??? at least a lil more constant dmg output in stead of hoping u one shot the balls off of somthing and if you don't ur dead. =) would love to see a re-mastered {{champion:85}}

I said this once and I'm going to say it again...

FERAL FLARE {{champion:78}} IS SO OP

You know who needs some love? Diana{{champion:131}} , I rarely ever see her being played, major leagues or minor. Shes an iffy assassin who needs the EXACT scenarios to get strong enough or fast enough to kill and not die without any help.

I just want to say a big "thanks" to you guys for paying so much attention to each and every champion- new or old. The fact that you guys work so hard to make sure no one gets left behind (whether it be visually, kit-wise or lore) is really heart-warming. :)

I think people are forgetting that rito will eventually get to all the champs from seasons 1 and 2.
Personally I think {{champion:85}} needs a new visual cause certain skins make him have noodle arms for example Karate Kennen
